Title: Relates to requiring gender neutral bathrooms in state-owned buildings
Summary: Relates to requiring gender neutral bathrooms in state-owned buildings; requires at least one gender neutral multiple-occupancy bathroom in state-owned buildings and, where practicable, in state-leased buildings that do not have a gender neutral single-occupancy bathroom; defines terms.
LawCode: Amd ยง145, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to requiring gender neutral bathrooms in state-owned buildings
